news_header: Prince William expresses his deep connections with Africa ahead of the Earthshot Prize ceremony in Cape Town, emphasizing the continent's importance in his life and the environmental focus of the awards.
news_text: Ahead of the Earthshot Prize awards ceremony in Cape Town, Prince William shared his strong personal ties to Africa, recalling how it has been a source of comfort and significant moments in his life, including proposing to his wife in Kenya. He highlighted that the awards, which support sustainable projects, have their roots in Namibia, where he first recognized the potential for innovative environmental solutions. This year's event emphasizes African-led initiatives, with over 400 projects nominated. The awards aim to inspire change and encourage investment in sustainable solutions, with a focus on tangible results. The ceremony will take place on November 6, featuring a performance from the Lion King.
